definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: Wing section and survival rates as second-class cabin seats 56%.
sentences.chinese: 机翼段和二等舱段座位的生还率同为56%。
在组队生还模式中赢得30场比赛。

sentences.english: These are near supernatural powers that may help the Student survive!
sentences.chinese: 他是接近于超自然能力，能够帮助学生生还。

sentences.english: People in Port-au-Prince watch as a French rescue team searches for a survivor.
sentences.chinese: 在太子港人们在看着法国救援队搜寻一名生还者。

sentences.english: This soldier was the sole survivor of the battle.
sentences.chinese: 这名士兵是这场战斗唯一的生还者。

sentences.english: One of the miners managed to get out alive. He's thought to be a 14-year-old boy, who sustained severe injuries.
sentences.chinese: 一名14岁的矿工成功生还，但是身受重伤。

sentences.english: It disgusts me to think that there are still survivors.
sentences.chinese: 光是有生还者这件事就让人厌恶。

sentences.english: The news stunned friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 渔民生还的消息让他们的朋友和亲戚惊得目瞪口呆。

sentences.english: Indonesian officials conceded hopes were growing dim.
sentences.chinese: 印尼官员承认落海人员生还的希望变得越来越模糊了。

sentences.english: Coastguards had given up all hope of finding the two divers alive.
sentences.chinese: 海岸警卫队对两位潜水员生还已完全不抱希望。

sentences.english: He was the sole passenger in first class to survive.
sentences.chinese: 他是头等舱乘客中唯一的生还者。

sentences.english: Local ship owners say a few survivors were pulled from the waters.
sentences.chinese: 当地船主说，有一些生还者被救起。

sentences.english: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.chinese: 你能从电视上海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这点。

sentences.english: Hasan Nuhanovic was one of the survivors watching from the public gallery.
sentences.chinese: 努哈诺维奇是在旁听席观看的生还者之一。

sentences.english: There have been allegations from survivors that safety standards had been lax .
sentences.chinese: 生还者一直指责安全标准执行不严。

sentences.english: Your economy car is so safe now that you'll survive an accident with a larger vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 现在经济性轿车即使与大卡车相撞都能保你平安生还。

definition: life/to survive/to save a life/to scrape a living
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
mortal danger, escape alive (idiom); a narrow escape/to survive by the skin of one's teeth
safe and sound (idiom)/to come out unscathed (e.g. from an accident or illness)
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
